title: Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 Performance-PLAZA
description:
P-R-E-S-E-N-T-S

Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Performance (c) PlayWay S.A

Release Date: 05/2016 Protection: Steam+Custom
Discs: 1 Genre: Racing

New package with racing track, new cars, parts and possibilities for
all car maniacs!

1/4 mile track
3 new cars
supercharged engines
new shop with performance parts
dyno with chip tuning
engine swaps

For more info go to: http://store.steampowered.com/app/361843/

1. Extract release
2. Mount ISO
3. Install the game
4. Copy crack from the PLAZA folder
5. Play!

Notes: this release is a standalone and includes the base game updated
to the latest version ( 1.0.7.1 Hotfix), the new Performance DLC and
all previously released DLCs:

> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Youngtimer
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Visual Tuning
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Trader Pack
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - PickUp & SUV
> Car Mechanic Simulator 2015 - Mercedes-Benz

General Notes:

Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from
trying to go online
If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
to run this game with admin privileges instead

CODEX - ENiGMA - ADDONiA

Coming soon
